short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Empowers you to discover, collect, store, share, and monetise your data in a fragmented data world.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Affinidi Vault enables a “360-degree view of oneself” for owning, collecting, storing, sharing, and monetising data that aligns with one’s preferences and values in a privacy-enabled and consent-driven manner. Affinidi Vault also provides integration with your applications, enabling your users to: 

• Securely manage their personal data 
• Store their data based on their preferences 
• Benefit from passwordless authentication using OID4VP standard.
